BurnSupport.description:
Set to off to disable disc burning. Set to on for normal default operation.
                    Set to authenticate to require authentication.
                    Setting this key to on will not enable disc burn support if it has already been disabled by other mechanisms or preferences.

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
